scripts.bootstrap: node ./scripts/checkoutCore.js clone && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build
scripts.bootstrapCI: node ./scripts/checkoutCore.js clone -d && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build
scripts.start: lerna run build && lerna run start  --parallel --stream --scope=@raincatcher/demo-*
scripts.publish:demo-mobile: rm -rf core/node_modules && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build --scope='@raincatcher/demo-mobile' --include-filtered-dependencies && NODE_DEBUG=gh-pages NODE_PATH=./node_modules node ./core/scripts/publish-app mobile --push true
scripts.publish:demo-portal: rm -rf core/node_modules && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build --scope='@raincatcher/demo-portal' --include-filtered-dependencies && NODE_DEBUG=gh-pages NODE_PATH=./node_modules node ./core/scripts/publish-app portal --push true
